export const lightTheme = {
    body: '#E2E2E2',
    text: '#363537',
    toggleBorder: '#FFF',
    gradient: 'linear-gradient(#39598A, #79D7ED)',
    button: '#363537',
    buttonBackground: '#E2E2E2',
    buttonBorder: '#363537'
}

export const darkTheme = {
    body: '#363537',
    text: '#FAFAFA',
    toggleBorder: '#6B8096',
    gradient: 'linear-gradient(#091236, #1E215D)',
    button: '#FAFAFA',
    buttonBackground: '#363537',
    buttonBorder: '#FAFAFA'
}
